overview: Peter Rabbit is a dynamic re-imagining of Beatrix Potters timeless childrens classic. When the Squirrel Tribe forget his birthday, Nutkin quits the squirrel life and decides to become a rabbit. In other adventures Nutkin is obsessed with raiding Mr McGregors garden for sunflower seeds and the rabbits must sneak Dr Bobtail onto Owl Island to save their squirrel friend.EpisodesThe Tale of Nutkin's Rabbity DayThe Tale of the Seed SnatchThe Tale of Dr. Bobtail's AdventureThe Tale of the Squabbling SquirrelsThe Tale of the High- flying BadgerThe Tale of the New HideoutThe Tale of the Heroic Hedgehog
title: Peter Rabbit: Nutkins Rabbity Day
